screen_desc: The screenshot shows a product page on Amazon.com for a Bose sound system offered at a discounted price of $179.00, reduced from the original $194.00. The product is refurbished, fully functional, and comes with a 90-day Amazon Renewed Guarantee. There is a shipping and import fees deposit of $65.09 for delivery to the Netherlands, and the estimated delivery is on Tuesday, December 6. The page indicates the item is in stock.

Once the item is added to the cart, the user will be able to proceed to checkout.
